name: Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor
author: WPRealizer

sections.description:
Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor is a powerful Elementor addon plugin designed to help you create stunning pricing tables quickly and easily, without any programming skills. With a variety of layout options and customization features, you can showcase your products and services in the best possible light.

Features

  • Responsive Design: Ensure your pricing tables look great on all devices.
  • Easy to Use: No coding required. Add features to your plans with a simple, user-friendly interface.
  • Multiple Layouts: Choose from Table, Toggle, and Single layouts to suit your needs.
  • Custom Colors and Styles: Fully customize the appearance of your pricing tables to match your brand.

Available Layouts:
1. Table: Display your pricing plans in a traditional table layout.
2. Toggle: Allow users to toggle between monthly and yearly pricing.
3. Single: Highlight a single pricing plan prominently.

PRO Features
Currently, there is no pro version available for this plugin.

Installation

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/unlimited-pricing-table-for-elementor directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Edit a page with Elementor and search for pricing tables.
  4. Add the “Pricing Table” widget to your page and customize it to your liking.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.9 or greater
  • PHP version 7.2 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Recommended Requirements

  • PHP version 8.1 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I use Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor?
After installing and activating the plugin, open Elementor and search for the “Pricing Table” widget. Drag it to your page and start customizing your pricing table.

Does Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor work with all themes?
Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor works with all themes that respect the coding standards of WordPress set by its Codex. It is recommended to use Elementor’s Hello Theme for full flexibility when using Elementor.

Is Elementor compatible with Gutenberg?
Elementor and Gutenberg work seamlessly together. You can easily decide which editor to use at every point while editing your site.

Do I need to know how to code?
No! Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor provides all the widgets and features you need to build a professional website without using code.

Is my site secure with Unlimited Pricing Table for Elementor?
The security of your website is extremely important to us. We take proactive measures to ensure your websites are secure, following industry best practices for maximum security and compliance.
